AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Curious explorer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] comes from mysterious origins, circling [PAWN_pronoun] list of places [PAWN_pronoun] wants to investigate and explore, all for the benefit of knowledge and curiousity. [PAWN_nameDef] is a pacifist, not believing in violence or combat of any kind as a means to an actual positive resolution to conflict.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Station child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Not all Asari grow up on beautiful capitol planets, [PAWN_nameDef] was unlucky enough to be born to parents involved with a remote mining station gang. Like most such places, the station was as much about criminal smuggling as mining, so [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to learn to brawl and tinker at young age.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pureblooded
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Both parents of [PAWN_nameDef] are Asari. [PAWN_nameDef] lived most of [PAWN_pronoun] madienhood in the worry and shame of being a potential Ardat-Yakshi, and had problems with having friends. Due to being picked on, [PAWN_pronoun] learned to fight back.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Matriarch's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has a powerful and influential Matriarch as [PAWN_pronoun] only parent. Due to the blood ties with such an influential figure, [PAWN_pronoun] got to get away with a lot of mistakes and poor choices in [PAWN_pronoun] maidenhood stage, and this made [PAWN_possessive] life one of expecting everybody else to forgive [PAWN_pronoun].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Seductive dancer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a asari dancers club. [PAWN_pronoun] entertained several people a day and improved [PAWN_pronoun] social skills along the way.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Asari architect
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an asari architect back on Thessia. [PAWN_pronoun] practiced traditional Asari buildings, planned ornate centerpieces to courtyards, and designed houses that could keep even Salarians calm. Asari architecture requires both building knowledge and artistic skill, and [PAWN_pronoun] knew it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Early matriarch
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Due to never melding as a matron, [PAWN_nameDef] became a Matriarch extremely early. This made [PAWN_nameDef] an outcast, without the young looks of a Matron nor the Wisdom of a Matriarch. Paranoid that people will make fun of [PAWN_pronoun], [PAWN_nameDef] signed up to fighting lessons.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Justicar
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After swearing [PAWN_pronoun]self to the Code of the Justicars, [PAWN_nameDef] became a well-known Justicar. Being powerful enough in combat to make Spectres intimidated, [PAWN_pronoun] gave away all [PAWN_possessive] items except [PAWN_possessive] weapons in honor of the organization.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Asari scientist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As a scientist, [PAWN_nameDef] worked at an asari lab. [PAWN_pronoun] occasionally made small breakthroughs in several fields of science, but most of [PAWN_possessive] was spent maintaining science equipment and feeding genetically altered fauna.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Small-arms police officer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Coming from a small asari town, [PAWN_nameDef] was only one of few police officers there. [PAWN_pronoun] guarded the town, imprisoned people who have done petty crime, and surveyed the 100 or so inhabitants for a chance of finding a criminal case.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Citadel wanderer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: To full fill the desire for entertainment and travel that a young asari has, [PAWN_nameDef] wandered the shops and bars of the citadel. Not that skillful at most tasks, [PAWN_pronoun] just talked and watched.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Asari trader
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an asari trader. [PAWN_pronoun] sold small trinkets and other items for Citadel travelers and tourists strait out of asari colonies. [PAWN_pronoun] knew how to prompt people to buying, and [PAWN_pronoun] knew how to ward of a rude customer.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Information broker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As an information broker located on the Citadel, [PAWN_nameDef] found out about both people's and organisation's private information. After getting a foothold in the Citadel's Political hiearchy, [PAWN_pronoun] became a highly saught-after figure, be it for employing, or assasination.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Citadel guard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After finding out the Citadel lacked guards on [PAWN_pronoun] sector, [PAWN_nameDef] signed up to be one. The rather rigorous training from the citadel didn't quite pay off after realising [PAWN_pronoun] would only be used for easing bar fights and greeting visitors.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Trauma-scarred
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After a terrorist-fueled security breach on the Citadel, [PAWN_nameDef] lost most of [PAWN_pronoun] friends and family. This broke [PAWN_nameDef], making [PAWN_possessive] unable to even hold weaponry, knowing how it can ruin lives.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Plant caretaker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As [PAWN_pronoun] job, [PAWN_nameDef] took care of the plants of the Citadel's many gardens. [PAWN_pronoun] job included replanting, trimming, and even creating new breeds of Citadel plants. This made [PAWN_possessive] extremely knowledgeable about most plants, but all the years of passive life dimmed down [PAWN_possessive] combat expertise.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Colonial trooper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Sent from the Citadel to a thriving colony to help around, [PAWN_nameDef] was brought to this rimworld. To survive in a rimworld, a soldier needs more than combat skill. [PAWN_nameDef] knew that [PAWN_pronoun] had to be a jack-of-all trades, so [PAWN_pronoun] took up farming and construction as a hobby.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Colonial manpower
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Sent from the Citadel to a colony that lacks manpower, [PAWN_nameDef] was brought to this rimworld to do un-skilled work. [PAWN_pronoun] took care of hauling and cleaning. This made [PAWN_nameDef] incapable of most skilled tasks.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Decorations artist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Working for the governing body of the Citadel, [PAWN_nameDef] made paintings and decorations for the many stores, corridors, and cafes of the Citadel. With some bussineses paying extra credits to get more intricate artwork, this made [PAWN_possessive] quite wealthy.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Citadel resident
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As a permanent resident residing in Citadel space, [PAWN_nameDef] had most of [PAWN_possessive] basic needs taken care of by just working part-time in a local establishment. This resulted in [PAWN_possessive] many hobbies such as ameteur sculpting, firearm study, and gazing at many records of ancient history.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Krogan heritage
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: A relative of [PAWN_nameDef] was a Krogan, part of whom’s genetic traits have been passed on down to [PAWN_possessive]. Although there is no substantial evidence backing the claims of inherited traits, [PAWN_nameDef] does display greater tendencies to aggression, resilience and resolution of conflicts via a head butt.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Turian heritage
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: A relative of [PAWN_nameDef] was a Turian, part of whom’s genetic traits have been passed on down to [PAWN_possessive]. Although there is no substantial evidence backing the claims of inherited traits, [PAWN_nameDef] does display greater tendencies to self-discipline, meat-based foods and an affinity for facial markings.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Salarian heritage
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: A relative of [PAWN_nameDef] was a Salarian, part of whom’s genetic traits have been passed on down to [PAWN_possessive]. Although there is no substantial evidence backing the claims of inherited traits, [PAWN_nameDef] does display greater tendencies to researching, fidgeting and an interest in patter songs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Vorcha heritage
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: A relative of [PAWN_nameDef] was a Vorcha, part of whom’s genetic traits have been passed on down to [PAWN_possessive]. Although there is no substantial evidence backing the claims of inherited traits, [PAWN_nameDef] does display greater tendencies to conflict, adaptability and an allergy to dairy products.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Human heritage
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: A relative of [PAWN_nameDef] was a Human, part of whom’s genetic traits have been passed on down to [PAWN_possessive]. Although there is no substantial evidence backing the claims of inherited traits, [PAWN_nameDef] does have an unusual affinity for a variety of tasks involving menial labour.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Quarian heritage
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: A relative of [PAWN_nameDef] was a Quarian, a rare occurrence, part of whom’s genetic traits have been passed on down to [PAWN_possessive]. Although there is no substantial evidence backing the claims of inherited traits, [PAWN_nameDef] does display greater tendencies to physical resilience, frequent allergies and improved eyesight in the ultraviolet spectrum.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hidden heritage
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Most Asari are at least familiar with what race their father was, however in the case of [PAWN_namDef], [PAWN_possessive] mother never told [PAWN_possessive]. This lack of cultural identity has caused [PAWN_possessive] to become somewhat of an outcast among [PAWN_possesive] peers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Proud daughter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Both of the parents of [PAWN_nameDef] were asari, which has given [PAWN_possessive] the insulting nickname of “pureblood” among the more contemporary asari. While somewhat stigmatized, [PAWN_pronoun] is proud of the legacy of [PAWN_possessive] parents and strives to prove [PAWN_pronoun] is more than just [PAWN_possessive] genetics.
